message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more!
You're taking a bit too much, let's try to find a fair middle ground!
I'm willing to take a bigger risk, but I need more!
I'm taking a risk, but I need to get something substantial!
I'll take most of it, it's now or never!
I'm taking a huge risk, but I need something, anything!
I'm taking all the risk, I'll take it all!
I'm begging, please, take a little something!
I'll take almost all, you can have a dollar!
